Pre-Game Insights: The Pacers won the first meeting of the season 135-132 in overtime on Oct. 30.
The Celtics won the second meeting of the season 142-105 on Dec. 27.
Indiana has lost two consecutive games after a five-game winning streak.
Boston returned to winning ways after losing two straight games against the Orlando Magic and the Philadelphia 76ers.
The game is scheduled to take place at the TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts at 6:00 p.m. ET.
